comments: Equals the INVERT transform of A045623: (1, 2, 5, 12, 28,...). [From _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 26 2010]
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5, -6, 1).
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[1] = 3; a[2] = 10; a[n_] := a[n] = 5*a[n-1] - 6*a[n-2] + a[n-3]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 22}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 05 2013, after Floor van Lamoen *)LinearRecurrence[{5,-6,1},{1,3,10},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 29 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) { f="b060557.txt"; a0=1; a1=3; a2=10; write(f, "0 1"); write(f, "1 3"); write(f, "2 10"); for (n=3, 500, write(f, n, " ", a=5*a2 - 6*a1 + a0); a0=a1; a1=a2; a2=a; ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 07 2009]
crossrefs: Cf. A052975 (row sums of triangle A060102).
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 06 2001
